Module com.example.c482pa
Package com.example.c482pa.controllers

Class ModifyPartController

java.lang.Object
com.example.c482pa.controllers.ModifyPartController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class ModifyPartController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class focuses on the modify part screen. It includes methods for modifying a part, canceling the modification of a part, validating the modified part, and initializing the text fields with values of the part to modify.

    • radioModifyOutsourcedPart

      void radioModifyOutsourcedPart(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Method that will change a label to Company Name if the outsourced radio button is picked
      Parameters:
      event - Radio button action

    • handleSaveModifyPart

      void handleSaveModifyPart(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Once the user wants to save a modified part, this method will cover the following mentioned below. Get the TextField value entered in. Convert the value to a String and pass it into another method for validation. If no error message is displayed, then the part will added as an inhouse or outsourced part depending on which radio button is selected. The user will then be redirected back to main screen.
      Parameters:
      event - Save modified part button action
      Throws:
      IOException - Thrown by FXMLLoader

    • partValidation

      public static String partValidation(String partName, int inven, double price, int min, int max, String eMessage)
      This method will take in all Textfield values and validate them. If any of these variables contains incorrect data, then an error message is returned.
      Parameters:
      partName - The part name
      inven - The stock level
      price - The price of the part
      min - The min stock level
      max - The max stock level
      eMessage - The error message
      Returns:
      The error message

    • invalidData

      public static void invalidData()
      If the user tries to submit a form with empty fields or enters incorrect values into the form, then an alert box will be displayed.

    • handleCancelModifyPart

      void handleCancelModifyPart(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      If the user clicks the cancel button, a confirmation box is displayed. If the user confirms the cancellation, then they will be redirected to the main screen. If not, they will remain on the same screen.
      Parameters:
      event - Cancel button action
      Throws:
      IOException - Thrown by FXMLLoader

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      This method will initialize the text fields with values of the part chosen to modify.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - Points to any specified resource such as a file or link
      resourceBundle - Locale-specific data from the end user's side
